item.description:
A cookie exchange for the holidays!

How does this work?

1. RSVP yes and sign up to make 2 dozen (at least 24) of one of the cookies listed below. When you RSVP, please place a comment at the BOTTOM of the meetup page listing what you have signed up for.
2. Bring the cookies with you to the meetup.
3. Exchange your cookies with other kinds to eat and bring home!

This should be a lot of fun and a great chance to try different kinds of cookies!

Please choose one of the following cookie types to make:
1. Chocolate Chip Cookies
2. Peanut Butter Cookies
3. Sugar Cookies
4. Oatmeal Cookies
5. Gingerbread Cookies
6. Brownies
7. Snickerdoodle Cookies
8. Citrus Cookies
9. Molasses Cookies
10. Toffee Cookies
11. YOUR CHOICE
12. YOUR CHOICE
13. YOUR CHOICE
14. YOUR CHOICE

***If you have any food allergies, it is YOUR responsibility to be aware of this and avoid any food that may have touched products that you are allergic to. IE, eat & swap at your own risk.***
item.how_to_find_us: Carrie will be answering the door!
item.name: Cookie Exchange!
